lead_paragraph: An unidentified boxer on Greece’s Olympic team tested positive in the latest drug scandal for Greek sports leading to the Beijing Games. The athlete’s name and disciplinary measures were not announced pending the result of tests on a backup sample, the Greek boxing federation said. Last month, 11 Greek weightlifters were suspended after testing positive for a steroid.
